Title: Peepli (Live)
Writer: Bhadwai (lyrics), Swanand Kirkire (lyrics), Noon Meem Rashet (lyrics), Anusha Rizvi (screenplay), Gangaram Sakhet (lyrics), Sanjeev Sharma (lyrics)
Actors: Omkar Das Manikpuri, Raghuvir Yadav, Shalini Vatsa, Farrukh Jaffar
Plot: An impoverished farmer's threat to end his life invites attention from politicians and media.
